name: ejs-static
description: This Directory is for bundling static assets for the ejs rendered pages to use and to server them for development

scripts.fullBuild: npm --prefix ../client run build && npm run build
scripts.fullBuild:prod: npm --prefix ../client run build:prod && npm run build:prod
scripts.static: mkdir -p ../dist/public/ejs && cp ./public/client-ejs/ejs.min.js ../dist/public/ejs/ && concurrently 'node static.js' 'nodemon webSocket.js' 'webpack watch --node-env=development'
scripts.static:prod: mkdir -p ../dist/public/ejs && cp ./public/client-ejs/ejs.min.js ../dist/public/ejs/ && concurrently 'node static.js' 'nodemon webSocket.js' 'webpack watch --mode=production --node-env=production'
scripts.dev: mkdir -p ../dist/public/ejs && cp ./public/client-ejs/ejs.min.js ../dist/public/ejs/ && concurrently 'node static.js' 'nodemon -e js,css,html,ejs --exec "node script.js"' 'nodemon webSocket.js' 'webpack watch --node-env=development'
